price: 32. Kuwaasi kala qaybshay diintooda oo noqday kooxo, xizbi walbaa waxay haystaan5 ay ku faraxsan yihiin.
arabic: مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُواْ دِينَهُمۡ وَكَانُواْ شِيَعٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
footnotes: 5. Waxay heystaan oo caqiidooyin ah, caadooyin , dhaqammo, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mina alladhīna farraqū dīnahum wakānū shiyaʿan kullu ḥiz'bin bimā ladayhim fariḥūna
